msbt.message: Ah! I take it this means you are ready to hear the details of my plan to draw K.K. here to hold a concert I call it Project K!
Yes, yes! I'll explain the last major task for Project K, then!
Well then, thanks for your help, hm?
Oho! You're already eager to hear how you can help out, hm?
Oho! Curious to know how you can help out, hm?

Well, we've got a fine building for Resident Services now. And you've no doubt admired the plaza, hm? It's primed and ready for major events, if I have anything to say about it.To think that we started with a deserted island and have grown into a bustling community I want to do something grand to celebrate!Oh yes I have big plans
Tell me more!
Good luck with that.
Ohoho! Got your attention, hm? Our goal
What?! Don't be so quick to dismiss my plans! At the very least, you should hear me out!You see, our goal
is to have the incredibly popular musician K.K. Slider come and put on a show here on !, I'm sure you know who K.K. is, yes?
I'm his biggest fan!
Not a clue.
I always knew you had excellent taste, !By the way, his song "K.K. Lament" is my go-to karaoke song!

Whaaa?! Are you serious?His songs are constantly playing on the radio, and yet somehow you've never heard of K.K.Wait, then this means you have yet to experience listening to his deep discography for the first time. In a way, I'm almost jealous

Ah, sorry about that. As you might guess, I'm a big fan. It's easy to get sidetracked talking about himBack to our goal. If we hold a K.K. concert here, could become a household name!We've done a lot so far to further the development of this island, buta K.K. show would be the culmination of all our hard work! I'd love your cooperation, .When you're ready for more details, come ask me "What should I do?" again!

This plan of mine is divided into three main stages.First, we need more visitors to come to our island.<10_4 /> Next, we need more folks to move here. And finally, we work hard to increase the overall image of this island!We'll increase the number of tourists and residents and we'll create a so lovedword of how great this island is will reach K.K., and he'll accept our offer to host a concert here!

Sofor the first step, we'll increase the number of tourists by adding a campsite to our island! A campsite will make it easier for visitors to experience life here. And it'll make for great PR material too!
With that in mindcould you get out your phone, ?
And done! I've sent you the recipe for a campsite construction kit!I want you to craft that and pick a great spot on the island for our new campsite. I'm counting on you!
We are going to build a campsite so that visitors can experience how wonderful life is on this island.
First, craft a campsite construction kit, and then find a good location to deploy it.

Once you've crafted the campsite construction kit, your next step will be finding a location to deploy it.I'll leave that up to you. I'm sure you are more than equal to the task of finding an ideal spot for a campsite.
Have you found a good location for our campsite?
Of course!
I found a place.
Splendid!<10_4 /> I can't wait to see the spot you picked out.Now that the location is settled, I can proceed with construction.Tomorrow we'll have a wonderful campsite for visitors. How exciting!
Thanks to your help, we have a place to put our new campsite
My plan is to open the campsite to visitors by tomorrow. Something to look forward to, hm?
Once the campsite is open, we can expect to see some new faces!
Our campsite will no doubt draw some interesting visitors.

If visitors are even the least bit interested in , I'll work my famous Tom Nook magic I'm sure I can persuade them to make permanent plans forI'm getting ahead of myself. It's no good counting your chickens before they've moved into the coop.
I'll do my best to have the campsite up and running by tomorrow, butit might be too much to wish for a visitor on opening day.
I managed to get the campsite open, but I knew it'd be too much to expect a visitor right away.

What we need is for visitors to be completely wowed by the wonders of life on our island.I'd appreciate anything you can do to help improve the island.Yes, yes! Do some weeding! Plant some flowers! Place some outdoor decorations to enhance the scenery!
Keep an eye on our campsite. Where there's a tent, there's bound to be a visitor, hm?And when you see a visitor, be a good host and work that famous charm!

We're on the last part of Project K, the grand plan to hold a K.K. concert on this island!If we can raise the image of this island and get some excellent word-of-mouth PRthen I'll make a proposal to K.K. about holding a concert here!If you need help on improving the island's image, chat with Isabelle.It wouldn't hurt to start getting ready for the concert by familiarizing yourself with some K.K. songs too!
